alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 1:49PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lowndes and west central Montgomery Counties through 230 PM CST... At 149 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gordonville, or near Mosses, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Mosses, Hayneville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Beechwood, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Woodcrest, Dannelly Field, Snowdoun, Sprague, Pinedale, Pintlala and Letohatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central Alabama.
